title: Computer Crashing in game: "THREAD_STUCK_IN_DEVICE_DRIVER"
body:
Approximately once out of every 3-4 games, midway through the game League will crash my computer, forcing a restart and giving the error message "THREAD_STUCK_IN_DEVICE_DRIVER". 

Each time, it was approximately midway through the game (~12-20 minutes in), and one game it happened twice (an additional time after my computer restarted and i rejoined the game). From what i found in a Google search, that error indicates a motherboard software issue, BUT this error has ONLY happened when i play League. I played Civ6 for 5 hours the other week and this issue didn't happen once. 

I do have Windows 10; i can post specific device details when i get home.

replies.body:
From my research as well, it points towards a driver or hardware issue. We can always dive into some system logs later down the road, but for the moment, I'd like you to work through the steps in our [Bugsplat & Crash Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes). This guide goes over updating your drivers and checking some basic hardware issues.

If you continue to see this issue after taking those steps, please let me know.
